text:
Darío Ramón Vivas Velasco (12 June 1950 – 13 August 2020) was a Venezuelan politician. He was a member of the National Assembly between 2006 until 2020. He was the Head of Government of the Distrito Capital between January 2020 until his death.
Vivas died on 13 August 2020 from COVID-19 in Caracas, aged 70.

annotations.surface_form: Head of Government of the Distrito Capital
